IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE MASTERS SCHOOL CELEBRATES ACTIVE PARTICIPATION, DEEP UNDERSTANDING, AND MEANINGFUL CONNECTION. A COMMUNITY OF DIVERSE INDIVIDUALS, WE GATHER TO LEARN, TO STRIVE, TO DARE, TO DO - TO BE A POWER FOR GOOD IN THE WORLD.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE MASTERS SCHOOL CELEBRATES ACTIVE PARTICIPATION, DEEP UNDERSTANDING, AND MEANINGFUL CONNECTION. A COMMUNITY OF DIVERSE INDIVIDUALS, WE GATHER TO LEARN, TO STRIVE, TO DARE, TO DO - TO BE A POWER FOR GOOD IN THE WORLD.
IRS990.Desc: WHAT DISTINGUISHES MASTERS IS ITS UNIQUE COMBINATION OF QUALITIES: THE WAY OUR TEACHERS CHALLENGE STUDENTS ACADEMICALLY EVEN WHILE MAKING THEM FEEL AT HOME; THE WAY WE BRING TOGETHER BOARDING STUDENTS FROM ACROSS THE COUNTRY AND AROUND THE WORLD WITH DAY STUDENTS TO INTRODUCE DIVERSE PERSPECTIVES INTO THE CONVERSATION; THE WAY WE ENABLE STUDENTS TO REALIZE THEIR GREATEST POTENTIAL ACROSS SO MANY DISCIPLINES-ACADEMIC, ATHLETIC, ARTISTIC-TO BECOME THEIR BEST SELVES. THIS DYNAMIC MELDING OF DEMANDING AND WELCOMING IS WHAT MAKES A MASTERS EDUCATION SO POWERFUL AND TRANSFORMATIVE. THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES APPROVED A NEW MISSION AND BELIEFS STATEMENT AND STRATEGIC PLAN ON NOVEMBER 1, 2014. WITH OUR NEW HEAD OF SCHOOL LAURA DANFORTH EFFECTIVE JULY 1, 2015, WE ARE EXPLORING THE WAYS WE CAN EVEN MORE EFFECTIVELY NURTURE AND EDUCATE OUR 670-STRONG STUDENT BODY ON OUR 96 ACRE CAMPUS CLOSE TO NEW YORK CITY.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.TitleTxt: DIR OF ENROLLMENT AND FIN. AID

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE RESTRICTED TO INVESTMENT IN PERPETUITY WITH INVESTMENT RETURN PRINCIPALLY AVAILABLE FOR GENERAL OPERATIONS. EARNINGS ON ONE PERMANENTLY RESTRICTED DONATION ARE TO BE USED FOR THE SCHOOL'S PLANT MAINTENANCE EXPENSES. THE SCHOOL'S ENDOWMENT CONSISTS OF A NUMBER OF INDIVIDUAL FUNDS, ESTABLISHED FOR A VARIETY OF PURPOSES AND CONSISTING OF BOTH DONOR-RESTRICTED ENDOWMENT FUNDS AND FUNDS DESIGNATED BY THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES TO FUNCTION AS ENDOWMENT.

THE SCHOOL HAD NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AS OF JUNE 30, 2016 AND 2015, IN ACCORDANCE WITH ACCOUNTING STANDARDS CODIFICATION ("ASC") TOPIC 740, "INCOME TAXES," WHICH PROVIDES STANDARDS FOR ESTABLISHING AND CLASSIFYING ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS.
PUBLICIZED IN THE NEW YORK TIMES
THE ORGANIZATION RECEIVED $397,515 FROM THE STATE OF NEW YORK.

THE CALCULATION OF EACH STUDENT'S GRANT ELIGIBILITY IS DOCUMENTED AND STORED IN THE STUDENT'S ADMISSION FILE. SELECTION CRITERIA IS DETAILED IN A PROCEDURES MANUAL AND POSTED PUBLICLY ON THE SCHOOL'S WEBSITE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH BOARD MEMBER IS PROVIDED A COPY OF FORM 990 FOR REVIEW PRIOR TO THE FILING OF THE RETURN. COMMENTS AND QUESTIONS ARE HEARD AT REGULARLY SCHEDULED BOARD MEETINGS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY APPLIES TO ALL MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES, THE HEAD OF SCHOOL, THE MEMBERS OF THE LEADERSHIP TEAM AND KEY EMPLOYEES OF THE MASTERS SCHOOL. A CONFLICT OF INTEREST OR POTENTIAL CONFLICT MUST BE DISCLOSED TO THE CHAIR OF THE BOARD WHO THEN REFERS THE MATTER TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD. THE BOARD REQUIRES DISCLOSURE OF ANY POSSIBLE PERSONAL, FAMILY OR BUSINESS RELATIONSHIP THAT COULD GIVE RISE TO A CONFLICT INVOLVING THE SCHOOL. IF A CONFLICT EXISTS, THE INDIVIDUAL WILL REFRAIN FROM PARTICIPATING IN ANY CONSIDERATION OF TRANSACTIONS INVOLVING THE CONFLICT. IN ADDITION, THEY CAN NOT PARTICIPATE IN ANY DISCUSSION REGARDING THE MATTERS AND CAN NOT VOTE OR BE PRESENT DURING THE VOTE REGARDING THE MATTER. THE POLICY AND DISCLOSURE STATEMENT ARE DISTRIBUTED ANNUALLY AND MUST BE COMPLETED AND SIGNED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HAS IN PLACE A COMPENSATION REVIEW COMMITTEE, WHICH REPORTS TO THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES. COMPARABILITY DATA USED ARE PEER COMPARISONS, INDUSTRY GUIDELINES AND AVERAGES. THE COMPENSATION MUST BE APPROVED BY THE COMMITTEE AS WELL AS MANAGEMENT OFFICIALS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THESE DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM PRIOR YEAR.
